attributes.action: stop making the uk taxpayers pay for global warming when it is a natural occurence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have had hot summers before and cold winters.  It is just a fact that we are going through a warming phase in the earth's cycle.  only 10000 years ago we were in an ice age!!!.

In fact while the ice caps are melting in places, they are freezing in others.

Germans have a power station that throws out 25m tonnes of co2 a year, they want to build 40 more!  

Why should a country as small as ours be made to pay more than the rest!!! as is usual, more for petrol etc etc.

These taxes will be used to fund anything but "green" measures, stop it now!
